mutants.original_line: return "For more than 5 particles, quantum entanglement is a complex phenomenon with significant implications in quantum cryptography, but its description is more generic and less straightforward."

return f"For {len(particles)} particles, quantum entanglement implies that measuring the state of one particle instantly affects the state of the others, regardless of the distance between them. This phenomenon has direct implications in quantum cryptography, enabling the creation of secure communication channels."
mutants.mutated_line: return f'{len(particles)} particles, quantum entanglement implies that measuring the state of one particle instantly affects the state of the others, regardless of the distance between them. This phenomenon has direct implications in quantum cryptography, enabling the creation of secure communication channels.'
